title: Forecast Janna Q playing some Star Guardian Janna Particles
body: Basically just go into a game as Janna and press Q, and you'll see the yellow stars from her SG skin, which look really bad with the brown tornado

replies.body: As much as I don't _want_ to say this, they intentionally added it.  For clarity reasons.
What really? That's a shame, it looks so bad :(
Hiya! These were intended changes that were made to increase clarity. We updated her tornadoes across the board for all skins.
